actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-136, by Ms. Matsui.

All points of order against the bill are waived except those arising under clause 9 or 10 of rule XXI. It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule, the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Homeland Security now printed in the bill.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 57.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 382.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 199 (Roll no. 310).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 197 (Roll no. 311).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1684) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2008, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 1684 (Department of Homeland Security Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2008).

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1684) to authorize appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2008, and for other purposes.
